Package asciipanel

Class AsciiPanelModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
asciipanel.AsciiPanelModel
public class AsciiPanelModel
extends java.util.Observable
This class models the state of an AsciiPanel instance, that is provides a raster and a font and notifies changes to observers. The methods beginPaint and endPaint provide a way to notify an AsciiPanel of changes to the content of the raster so that the panel can repaint itself. All changes to raster content must be preceded by a call to beginPaint and followed by a call to endPaint, otherwise no notification is sent.
Author:
Lorenzo Bianchi

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AsciiPanelModel()

    AsciiPanelModel​(AsciiRaster raster)
    Constructs an AsciiPanelModel with specified raster and default font (CP437_9x16)
    AsciiPanelModel​(AsciiRaster raster, AsciiFont font)
    Constructs an AsciiPanelModel with specified raster and font
